nodes.title: A Door in Dusk
nodes.prose:
Nyssa finds a door of dusk-glass resting upright in the alley. Night wind slips through its seams, humming like distant strings.

- She can enter without knowing where it leads.
- Or pause long enough to ask for an omen.

choices.label: Wait on the porch of omens

nodes.title: Porch of Whispers
nodes.prose:
A travelling oracle fans a deck across a crate. Symbols reform to match Nyssa's breath. The oracle smiles, inviting her to draw.

Nyssa pockets the drawn sigil, feeling a thread tug at her future.

choices.label: Carry the omen into the hall

nodes.title: Echo Hall
nodes.prose:
Inside, corridors bloom in every direction. Brass mirrors hum softly, capturing each echo.

One mirror flickers with a map, another with moonlight dripping down a stairwell.

nodes.title: Map Library
nodes.prose:
Scrolls hover in the air, cycling through routes that only exist at twilight. Nyssa catches a parchment that warms in her hands.

The map redraws the hall with glowing threads leading outside.

nodes.title: Garden Gate
nodes.prose:
A silver gate opens to two paths: one descends toward a moonwell, the other climbs into a wind-carved pass.

The air tastes of copper; fate leans close.

nodes.title: Moonwell Shrine
nodes.prose: Moonwater collects in a stone basin. Reflections reveal choices Nyssa has yet to make. When she touches the surface, a quiet oath blooms in her chest.

choices.label: Carry the oath to the cliff

nodes.title: Cliff of Futures
nodes.prose:
On the cliff's edge, threads of possibility weave into a luminous braid. Whether she holds the moonwell oath or not, Nyssa must choose which strand to follow next.

The adventure pauses here, ready for your next chapter.
